episodes.title: LIVE: AZ v. Lori Daybell Conspiracy Trial - Sentencing
episodes.description:
LIVE COURT CAM: Phoenix, AZ - Sentencing - "Cult Mom" Lori Vallow Daybell, who is already serving life sentences for three murders in Idaho, returns to court for sentencing on two additional conspiracy convictions in Arizona. Daybell was convicted of conspiring to kill her fourth husband, Charles Vallow, who was fatally shot by Daybell’s brother, Alex Cox, and conspiring to kill her ex-nephew-in-law, Brandon Boudreaux.

episodes.title: LIVE: GA v. Chloe Driver - Sentencing | Cult Baby Murder Trial

episodes.title: Vinnie Politan Investigates: Doomsday Prophet Murder Trial | Court TV Podcast
episodes.description: PODCAST- Vinnie Politan investigates the bizarre world of Chad Daybell and Lori Vallow Daybell, commonly referred to as “The Doomsday Couple.” Both faced charges in the deaths of Lori’s two children, 7-year-old JJ Vallow and 16-year-old Tylee Ryan, and Chad’s first wife, Tammy Daybell. Last year, Lori was convicted on conspiracy and first-degree murder charges and is serving the first of three consecutive life sentences without parole. Chad is on trial now, where prosecutors say Chad and Lori used their spiritual beliefs to cover a carefully calculated plan fueled by money, sex and power to kill those who stood in the way. Meanwhile, Chad’s attorney says no evidence connects Chad to the children’s murders despite their remains being discovered in his backyard. In this special podcast episode, Vinnie Politan will look back at some of the most memorable moments in his investigation into The Doomsday Couple. Lori Vallow’s other brother, Adam Cox, and her uncle, Rex Conner, join Vinnie to give an inside look at Lori’s complex family dynamic, the murders and Chad Daybell’s trial. In the second half of this episode, Vinnie and his guests discuss the timeline of Lori and Chad’s relationship and Chad’s children who have stood by their father’s side throughout the investigation. Special Guests: Adam Cox: Lori Vallow’s Brother Rex Connor: Lori Vallow’s Uncle Megan Conner: Lori Vallow Daybell’s cousin & author of “I Walked Through Fire” Sharonda Brown: Licensed Mental Health Clinician Eric Smith: Religious Author, Acquaintance of Chad Daybell Mike King: Religious Cult Expert Watch 24/7 Court TV LIVE Stream Today https://www.courttv.com/ Join the Investigation Newsletter https://www.courttv.com/email/ Court TV Podcast https://www.courttv.com/podcast/ FOLLOW THE CASE: Facebook https://www.facebook.com/courttv Twitter/X https://twitter.com/CourtTV Instagram https://www.instagram.com/courttvnetwork/ TikTok https://www.tiktok.com/@courttvlive YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/COURTTV WATCH +140 FREE TRIALS IN THE COURT TV ARCHIVE https://www.courttv.com/trials/ HOW TO FIND COURT TV https://www.courttv.com/where-to-watch/

episodes.title: LIVE: ID v. Lori Vallow Daybell - Sentencing Doomsday Cult Mom Trial
episodes.description:
LIVE COURT CAM - ID v. Lori Vallow Daybell | SENTENCING: Lori Vallow Daybell is facing life in prison after being convicted in the deaths of her two children and conspiring to kill her fifth husband's previous wife.

Back in May, the so-called Doomsday Cult Mom was convicted of first-degree murder in the deaths of 16-year-old Tylee Ryan and 9-year-old JJ Vallow, and conspiring to kill Tammy Daybell. She was also found guilty of grand theft. The kids' bodies were found buried on Chad Daybell's Freemont County, Idaho property in 2020.

Some family members and Lori Vallow Daybell herself will have an opportunity to speak before Judge Boyce hands down the sentence.

episodes.title: LISTEN | Lori Vallow Daybell: New Trial Hearing
episodes.description:
#CourtTV AUDIO PODCAST: Convicted killer Lori Vallow Daybell is back in court seeking a new trial after a juror spoke after the verdict. In May, Lori was found guilty on six criminal counts, including the murders of her two children, Tylee Ryan and JJ Vallow, and conspiracy in the death of her fifth husband’s first wife, Tammy Daybell.

In their motion, defense attorneys argued the jury instructions were confusing. The defense also said that they believe that the jury was influenced by “outside sources,” and at least one of the jurors had information that was not entered into evidence. Attorneys say that information came to light during a post-trial interview with East Idaho News.

episodes.title: LISTEN: ID v. Lori Vallow Daybell | Kay Woodcock, Day 1
episodes.description:
COURT CAST: Doomsday Cult Mom Trial, ID v. Lori Vallow Daybell - Opening Statements |  Kay Woodcock, the sister of Lori Vallow's late husband Charles Vallow, takes the stand. Woodcock is also JJ Vallow's grandmother.

Lori Vallow Daybell is facing life in prison if convicted of murdering her two children, JJ Vallow & Tylee Ryan, and conspiring to kill her fifth husband’s previous wife Tammy Daybell.   Per Judge's orders, no cameras are allowed for the proceedings.
